Sentencas: The present-day high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), based on yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte, a lanthanum-strontium manganite (LSM) cathode and a nickel-YSZ cermet anode, operate at 800-1000 degrees C. Cathode materials are restricted to doped lanthanum manganites due to their stability in oxidizing atmosphere, sufficient electrical conductivity, and thermal expansion match to the YSZ electrolyte.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: Reduction in the operating temperature of SOFCs is desirable to lower the costs and to overcome the technological disadvantages associated with elevated temperatures.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: However, as the operating temperature is reduced, the decrease in the LSM conductivity and increase in interfacial polarization resistances between the LSM cathode and YSZ electrolyte become critical.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: Therefore, different approaches have been proposed to improve interfacial quality and electrochemical performance of the LSM/YSZ cathode.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: The length of the triple-phase boundary (TPB) correlates well with the interfacial resistances to electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen at the anode and reduction in oxygen at the cathode.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: The extension of the TPB or the number of active reaction sites becomes, therefore, a determining factor in improving electrode performance.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: This can be achieved by developing electrode materials of higher ambipolar conductivity and by optimizing the microstructure of the electrodes.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: In order to improve SOFC performance, both composition and structure of the LSM/YSZ interface and of the cathode should be optimized.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: Recently, functional grade materials (FGMs) were introduced for SOFC technology.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: However, all studies reported in the literature so far, were focused on cathodes with only compositional gradient.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: On the other hand, intuitionally the best structure for a functional SOFC should be characterized by both compositional and porosity gradients.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: Fine grains (and high surface area) close to the electrode/electrolyte surface and large grains (and thus large pore size) at the air/oxygen side are expected to be of advantage.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: In the present study, symmetrical cathode-electrolyte-cathode SOFC single cells were fabricated.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: The cells consisted of the functional grade LSM cathode with YSZ/LSM cathode functional layer and LSM contact layer.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: The effects of various geometrical and microstructural parameters of cathode/functional layers on the overall cell performance were systematically investigated.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: The parameters investigated were the (1) cathode functional layer thickness and grain size and (2) the LSM contact layer thickness.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: Cathode performances were tested by means of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) over a temperature range of 650-950 degrees C, using air as oxidant.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: The dependence of cell performance on various parameters was rationalized by a comprehensive microscale model.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy

Sentencas: A cathode polarization corresponding to 0.14-0.4 ohm cm(2) at 750 degrees C was achieved in this manner.
Titulo: Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy
Geometrical Optimization of Double Layer LSM/LSM-YSZ Cathodes by Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy
